If you don’t like #politics, you probably shouldn’t follow me. 😁 Though I do also have a #creative side, and I'm a #maker too.

#Decarbonization, #Electrification, #BehavioralChange. #RenewableEnergy #AtScale. #WindEnergy, #SolarEnergy, #OceanEnergy (#TidalEnergy, #WaveEnergy) and #BESS -#LDS.

I like to explore the world through creativity when possible. I run dungeons and dragons games, paint miniatures, invent fantastic stories and situations to explore the human experience.

I take no sides in the conflict around me. I am a Canadian citizen, yet my heritage is Jewish, despite not practicing.

I feel very strongly about equality, understanding, breaking through past biases, environment, social issues, and I believe that the best path towards understanding is through play.

On a serious note, I stand for these things for all beings:

1. right to exist
2. right to free will of choice

In THAT order. No "free will" being used to deny others' right to exist. Right to existence is always first, because there is no free will if we don't exist. That's why I bonk orcs... blatant violations of both rights.
